newsitem.title: USA: Logic Works buys data software technology.
newsitem.headline: Logic Works buys data software technology.

text.p: Logic Works Inc said Monday it acquired the technology behind TestBytes, an automatic test data-generation tool, from a privately held software manufacturer.

It did not disclose the terms of the transaction, which it said would be accounted for as a purchase in the third quarter ended September 30. In addition, about $1 million will be spent primarily for research and development in the quarter.
Logic Works did not identify the software manufacturer.
Logic Works said the product will be available in the fourth quarter. The price will be announced at that time, it said.
Lead engineers for TestBytes will join the staff of Logic Works to continue to support and improve the product, the company said.
